sentences.english: He is a physically active, super—curious and highly inquisitive boy.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位體力活躍，非常好奇以及很好問的男孩。

sentences.english: The left slice shows an area active during extemporaneous speech just posterior and adjacent to the tumor.
sentences.chinese: 左切片顯示面積活躍在即席講話只是後，毗鄰的腫瘤。

sentences.english: Their DNA was also loosening up and making memory genes more active.
sentences.chinese: 它們的DNA也鬆開了，使記憶體基因更加活躍。

sentences.english: The only non-ceasefire group active along the border is the Shan State Army "South"'s Force 701.
sentences.chinese: 沿邊境活躍的唯一非停火武裝是南撣邦軍701部隊。

sentences.english: Ask how many active Scrum teams they have at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 因此要詢問他們此時有多少活躍的Scrum團隊。

sentences.english: Transcriptionally active regions are replicated first.
Obligation followed is a very living factor in the space of contract world.
sentences.chinese: 附隨義務是合同世界裏十分活躍的因素。

sentences.english: The recent development in renewable natural resource and a viable replacement for wood have led to a growing activity in bamboo resource utilizations.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，竹類資源的研究和利用在國內外十分活躍。

sentences.english: About one-third had previously been sexually active.
sentences.chinese: 其中大概有三分之一的人在此之前有過性活躍狀態。

sentences.english: For this reason, the researches on opening up wasteland were always hot.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，有關屯墾的研究歷來較爲活躍。

sentences.english: The special merchandise brought by these peddlers, coming in throngs from other areas, enliven the local market.
sentences.chinese: 這些客幫帶來的特色商品活躍了本地市場。

sentences.english: Everyone of us is active in technical innovation.
sentences.chinese: 劉娜是班上最活躍的女孩。

sentences.english: The brain rests, then it becomes active, then dreaming occurs.
sentences.chinese: 大腦休息，然後它變得活躍，然後做夢發生。

sentences.english: Once you start eating better, you start to think better.
sentences.chinese: 只要你的飲食開始變好，你的想法就會更活躍。

sentences.english: This class was certainly a lively lot , to say the least.
sentences.chinese: 至少可以說，這個班是相當活躍的一個班集體。

sentences.english: Look, sexual chemistry with other people is normal, and feeling guilty about a crush is an exercise in futility.
sentences.chinese: 暗地的迷戀添入活躍感覺對現在兩人是有益處的。

definition: long term/long time/long range (of a forecast)
